name: PixelFem #40 - Williamina Fleming
description:
Williamina Fleming rose from unlikely and humble beginnings to become an important astronomer whose star classification system formed the basis of all subsequent systems. In the 1880s, the Harvard Observatory director was frustrated with his staff, and would say "My Scottish maid could do better!" So, he hired his Scottish maid - Williamina Fleming. She ran a team for decades, classified tens of thousands of stars and discovered white dwarfs and the Horsehead Nebula.

✺This work is part of PixelFems, an evolving project on the Tezos blockchain celebrating iconic women from the past and present✺
